title: Joaquín Guzmán
Born: Joaquín Archivaldo Guzmán Loera ,  (1954-12-25) 25 December 1954 (age 64) , or ,  (1957-04-04) 4 April 1957 (age 61) , La Tuna, Badiraguato Municipality, Sinaloa, Mexico
Criminal status: On trial at the United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York
Spouse(s): At least 4 Alejandrina María Salazar Hernández (1977)
Relatives: At least 10 Iván Archivaldo Guzmán Salazar
Criminal charge: Murder, money laundering, drug trafficking, racketeering, organized crime
Reward amount: Mexico: US$3.8 million , United States: US$5 million
Capture status: 1st capture: 9 June 1993 , 2nd capture: 22 February 2014 , 3rd capture: 8 January 2016
Wanted by: Attorney General of Mexico and the US Drug Enforcement Administration
